name: @laminasignal/chippy

scripts.build: babel src --out-dir esm --extensions .ts --presets @babel/preset-env,@babel/preset-typescript --no-babelrc && babel src --out-dir cjs --extensions .ts --presets @babel/preset-env,@babel/preset-typescript --no-babelrc --plugins @babel/plugin-transform-modules-commonjs
